article:
One day, a little monkey was having a sleep in a tree.Suddenly, he was awakened  by a kind of cry for help.Opening his _ , the monkey found a mantis .A black bird was preparing to attack him. _  thinking, the monkey jumped over and frightened away the bird.
"Thank you very much for _ my life, Mr.Monkey," the mantis said."If you didn't _ in time, the bird would kill me."
"It is my _ ," the monkey replied, and then jumped to another tree to look for fun."Saving a small animal's life is wonderful," the monkey said to  _ .
At this moment, he suddenly  _  another cry.The monkey quickly found four small birds _  in a nest.They cried because they are  _ ."I think I'll die if Mum does not _ food home soon," one baby bird cried to the other ones.
Then, the mother bird flew  _ ."Sorry, my dear children, I did not bring you any food.A moment ago, I was almost sure to  _  a big mantis.If the naughty monkey didn't interfere , that mantis would be a good  _ for you."
Hearing this, the monkey was _ .He went to talk with the most knowledgeable elephant."You didn't do _ wrong," the elephant replied."In the world, nobody can take care of everyone."
